description:
Whis is the caretaker as well as trainer of http://anidb.net/ch53774 [Beerus], the god of destruction of Universe 7.
He and his siblings are one of the strongest beings in all of creation, only admitting that his father http://anidb.net/ch84322 [Daishinkan] and http://anidb.net/ch82121 [King of All] are stronger.
name: Whis
